humanum_full_description_en:
Bronze inscriptions from " factory ", " ten thousand " sound, " factory " is the simple province of " stone ", inscriptions and Warring States bamboo slips also directly from " stone ", there is no simple province (see Lu Da Si Tu Zizhong Bai Yu, "Tsinghua Bamboo Slip Three. Shuo Hit" Slip 2, "Shanghai Museum Bamboo Slip Three. Zhouyi" Slip 22). " Li " is the first article of " Li ". The original meaning is a rough and hard whetstone. "Shuowen": "Strong, dry stone. From the factory, you can save the sound. 𧓽, or not." The extension includes sharpening, polishing, tempering, invigorating, severe, Fiercely waiting for justice.

Jin Wentong falsely means " ten thousand ", and San Bogui: "It is forever (ten thousand years) to be used forever", which means that it will be used forever for ten thousand years. It is also used as a person's name for the Five Sacrifices Wei Ding: "Li Naixu", which means Li and then promise.

The bamboo slips of the Warring States Period were used as the original meaning to indicate the sharpening stone. "Said the hit" Jane 2: "If Jin, Yong (Yong) Ku (Wei) female (Ru) Zha (Zhou) Li." The handed down "Shang Shu. "Speaking of Life" is written as "If you are gold, use you as hard." It means like metal, use you as a sharpening stone. It also means tempering and tempering, "Shangbo Zhushu IV. Jane 38-39 of the Chen of Cao Mo: "A man's soldiers are not tough (hardened), but our soldiers must be tough (hardened)." It means that other soldiers will not exercise, our soldiers must exercise. He also expressed strictness, "Shanghai Bo Zhushu Six. "Yongyue" Jane 13: "Cruel (cruel) well (punishment) and severe government", which means fierce punishment and severe politics. Also expressed danger, "Shanghai Bo Zhushu III. "Book of Changes" Jane 22: "Also (have) sharpness, Li Si (already)." It means that there is danger, which is good for stopping (Chen Guying).

Modern Chinese means severe and fierce "extreme". Originally written as "pros", it refers to both advantages and disadvantages. The extended meaning is serious, because the matters of interest are often more serious, and the extended meanings are fierce and fierce. Since most people feel that the meaning of the word " li " is not related to the meanings of "violent" and "fierce", the word " li " is used to replace it (Qiu Xigui).
humanum_short_description_en: Inscriptions from the " factory ", " Wan " sound, the original meaning for the grindstone, is " grind beginning of the text" of.
humanum_full_description:
金文從「厂」，「萬」聲，「厂」是「石」的簡省，金文和戰國竹簡亦有直接從「石」，沒有簡省之形（參魯大司徒子仲白匜、《清華簡三．說命中》簡2、《上博竹書三．周易》簡22）。「厲」是「礪」的初文。本義為質地粗糙、堅硬的磨刀石，《說文》：「厲，旱石也。从厂，蠆省聲。𧓽，或不省。」引申有磨礪、整飭、磨練、振奮、嚴厲、猛烈等義。

　　金文通假為「萬」，散伯簋：「其厲（萬）年永用」，意謂萬年永遠使用。又用作人名，五祀衛鼎：「厲廼許」，意謂厲於是應許。

　　戰國竹簡用作本義，表示磨刀石，《清華簡二．說命中》簡2：「若金，甬（用）隹（惟）女（汝）乍（作）厲。」傳世本《尚書．說命上》作「若金，用汝作礪。」意謂比如金屬，用您為磨刀石。又表示磨練、鍛鍊，《上博竹書四．曹沫之陳》簡38-39：「人之兵不砥厲（礪），我兵必砥厲（礪）。」意謂別人的士兵不鍛鍊，我們的士兵必鍛鍊。又表示嚴厲，《上博竹書六．用曰》簡13：「兇（凶）井（刑）厲政」，意謂凶狠的刑罰，嚴厲的政治。又表示危險，《上博竹書三．周易》簡22：「又（有）厲，利巳（已）。」意謂有危險，利於止步不前（陳鼓應）。

　　現代漢語表示劇烈、凶猛的「厲害」，本來寫作「利害」，指好處和壞處，引申有嚴重的意思，因為有利害關繫的事往往比較嚴重，又引申有劇烈、凶猛等意思。由於一般人覺得「利」字的意義和「劇烈」、「凶猛」等義聯繫不起來，所以才以「厲」字來代替它（裘錫圭）。
humanum_short_description: 金文從「厂」，「萬」聲，本義為磨刀石，是「礪」的初文。

厲字的基本解释

厲
lì
见“厉”。

厲字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lì］
［《廣韻》力制切，去祭，來。］
“厉1”的繁体字。
(1)“礪”的古字。粗磨石。
(2)磨砺。
(3)揣摩；钻研。
(4)操练；整饬。
(5)“勵”的古字。劝勉。
(6)指讽劝。
(7)振奋。
(8)指鞭打、扬（鞭）。
(9)振（翅）；奋起。
(10)疾飞；疾驰。
(11)踊起；飞升；到达。
(12)威猛；猛烈；激烈。
(13)谓声音高而急。
(14)高。
(15)严肃；严厉。
(16)危险。
(17)虐害；欺压。
(18)灾祸；祸患。
(19)病灾；瘟疫。
(20)指染疫而死。
(21)指病人。
(22)恶鬼。
(23)恶。
(24)谥号。
(25)祭无人祭祀之鬼。
(26)河水深及腰部，可以涉过之处。
(27)指涉水。
(28)指桥。
(29)藩界。
(30)裁减。
(31)腰带下垂貌。
(32)拴；系。
(33)方言。犹瞪。
(34)月在戊曰厲。

厲字的康熙字典解释

【子集下】【厂字部】　厲； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页163第09
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】力制切【正韻】力霽切，?音例。【說文】旱石也。从厂，蠆省聲。【徐曰】旱石，麤悍石。【玉篇】磨石也。【詩·大雅】取厲取鍛。又磨也。【左傳·成十六年】秣馬厲兵。【荀子·性惡篇】鈍金必將待礱厲然後利。又【說文】嚴也。【論語】聽其言也厲。又【廣韻】烈也，猛也。【禮·表記】不厲而威。又【玉篇】危也。【易·乾卦】厲无咎。又【爾雅·釋詁】厲，作也。【註】穀梁傳曰：始厲樂矣。【疏】興作也。【方言】厲，?，爲也。甌越曰?，吳曰厲。又【玉篇】虐也。【孟子】厲民以自養也。又【玉篇】上也。【詩·衞風】在彼淇厲。【韻會】岸危處曰厲。又【詩·衞風】深則厲。【註】以衣涉水，由帶以上曰厲。又【周禮·秋官·司厲註】犯政爲惡曰厲。又【爾雅·釋天】月在戌曰厲。又【韻會】醜惡也。【莊子·天地篇】厲之人夜半生子，恐其似己。又【史記·嚴安傳】民不夭厲。【註】厲，病也。又【前漢·儒林傳】以厲賢才焉。【註】師古曰：厲，勸勉之也。又【息夫躬傳】鷹隼橫厲。【註】師古曰：厲，

厲字的源字形

字源演变：

金文小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
厲字的起名意思

暂无。

lì

Stern
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［lì］
["Guangyun" force cutting, go to sacrifice, come. ]
The traditional characters of "李1".
(1) The ancient word "gri". Rough grindstone.
(2) Grinding.
(3) Try to figure out; delve into it.
(4) Drill; tidy up.
(5) The ancient word "Li". Exhort.
(6) Refers to satire and persuasion.
(7) Exciting.
(8) Refers to whipping and whipping (whip).
(9) Vibrate (wing); rise up.
(10) Flying fast; galloping.
(11) Get up; soar; arrive.
(12) Mighty; fierce; fierce.
(13) The voice is high and urgent.
(14) High.
(15) Serious; severe.
(16) Danger.
(17) Torture; bullying.
(18) Disaster; disaster.
(19) Disease; plague.
(20) Refers to death from the epidemic.
(21) Refers to the patient.
(22) Devil.
(23) Evil.
(24) Posthumous title.
(25) Sacrifice the ghost of no one offering sacrifices.
(26) The river is deep to the waist, where it can be waded.
(27) Refers to wading.
(28) Refers to the bridge.
(29) Domains.
(30) Reduction.
(31) The appearance of sagging belt.
(32) Tie; tie.
(33) Dialects. Still staring.
(34) The month is violent in Wu.

[Subset 2] [Factory Word Department] 　Li; Kangxi strokes: 15; Page number: Page 163 No. 09
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] Forced cutting [Zheng Yun] cutting forcefully,? Sound examples. [Said the text] Dry stone also. From the factory, faintly. [Xu Yue] Dry stone, rough stone. [Jade articles] Grinding stones also. 【Poetry·Daya】Take hard work. Grind again. [Zuo Zhuan·Sixteen years of adulthood] Mo Ma Li Bing. 【Xunzi·Evil Sex】Dun Jin will surely be hardened and then profitable. [Said Wen] Yan Ye. [The Analects] Listen to his words and be strong. [Guang Yun] Lie Ye, Meng Ye. 【Rite·Table Record】Not fierce but prestigious. Also 【Jade articles】Dangerous. [Yi·Qian Gua] Li Wugui. Also 【Erya·Shixu】Li, make it too. [Note] Gu Liang Chuan said: Beginning with Li Leqiang. 【Sparse】Xing Zuo also. [Dialect] Li,?, Wei Ye. Ou Yue said?, Wu Yueli. Also 【Jade articles】Too much abuse. [Mencius] Li Min also supports himself. Also on 【Jade articles】. 【Poetry·Weifeng】In Biqili. [Rhyme Club] The bank is in danger and said to be severe. Also 【Poetry·Weifeng】Deep but strong. 【Note】Wade with clothes, and say violently by bringing the above. Also【Zhou Li·Qiuguan·Sili Note】If you commit a crime, you will be violent. [Erya·Shitian] Yue Zaixu said Li. And [Rhyme Club] is also ugly. [Zhuangzi·Heaven and Earth Chapter] Li Zhiren has a son in the middle of the night, fearing that he will be like himself. Also [Historical Records · Yan An Biography] The people are not stern. [Note] Severe, sick. Also [Previous Han·Rulin Biography] Li Xian was talented. [Note] Shi Gu said: Li, it's an exhortation. Also [Six Fu Biography] The eagle falcon is stern. [Note] Shi Gu said: Li,
